Smelter is a Canadian digital product studio that empowers business owners and marketing teams with UX-driven digital solutions. We build intuitive digital products that make your life easier and helps your business thrive.

Making the web better. One product at a time.

We build the kind of digital products we wish existed: reliable, intuitive, and built with empathy.

Smelter Studio is a Canadian digital product company on a mission to make the web more accessible, performant, and user-friendly.

We're a small team of designers and developers who believe that great software should feel invisible‚Äîit should just work. Every product we build starts with a simple question: "What would we want to use?"

From WordPress plugins to SaaS tools, we focus on solving real problems for real people. No bloat. No unnecessary complexity. Just thoughtful solutions that respect your time and intelligence.
